title: Is the Odyssey Sona emote available at all still?
body:
Title says all, love support as a role and am gutted that I can't get it :/ thanks ! 

JakeCat

replies.body:
It isn't available currently but will be in the next BE Emporium fro 25,000 BE. You can check out the post here:

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-spotlight/upcoming-changes-league-partner-chromas
